caption.title: Current wave of rabies in Yunnan Province, China.
caption.p: A. Upper panel: human rabies in Yunnan Province from 1976 to 2015; lower panel: sampling of RABV samples in Yunnan Province. B. Locations of the RABV sequences sampled from dogs, 2006â€“2015. Circle areas are proportional to the number of gene-specific sequences sampled in each location and coloured according to a given clade (dark green: N gene clade SEA-1, green: N gene clade SEA-2, yellow: N gene clade SEA-3, red: G gene clade Asian-1, orange: G gene clade Asian-2).
